item.title: Create beautiful cartogram heatmaps with Statebins
item.description: Statebins Statebins is a neat R package that allows for the easy creation of beautiful cartogram heatmaps in the style of http://bit.ly/statebins. The cartograms statebins generates offer a visually appealing and somewhat minimal alternative to a typical cartogram in that the states are uniform squares aligned in a grid. Statebins has been updated recently and currently depends on a development version of ggplot2 so the following command is necessary to install it.
